spec.goal:
Replace JSON graph storage with SQLite for faster cross-project queries and smaller size.

Implementation:
1. Create storage.py with SQLite schema (projects, modules, interfaces, edges, deps_external tables)
2. Add indexes for fast cross-project queries (interfaces.name, edges.target, deps_external.package)
3. Update indexer.py to write to SQLite instead of JSON
4. Add query methods for cross-project lookups
5. Migrate existing JSON graphs to SQLite
6. Update CLI commands that read graph data
7. Add export command for portability

Location: ~/.eri-rpg/graphs.db (single global database)
